# Vue Star Rate

> A highly customizable, accessible, and feature-rich star rating component for Vue 3

## Overview

Vue Star Rate (npm: vue-js-star-rating) is a modern star rating component built with Vue 3 and TypeScript. It provides a flexible, accessible solution for implementing star ratings in Vue applications.

## Key Features

- **Half-Star Support**: Enable precise 0.5 increment ratings
- **Size Presets**: xs (16px), sm (20px), md (24px), lg (32px), xl (40px)
- **Custom Colors**: Configure empty, filled, hover, and half-star colors
- **Keyboard Navigation**: Full accessibility with arrow keys, Home, End, number keys
- **Read-only Mode**: Display ratings without user interaction
- **TypeScript**: Complete type definitions included
- **RTL Support**: Right-to-left layout compatibility
- **WCAG 2.1 Compliant**: Fully accessible

## Installation

```bash
npm install vue-js-star-rating
# or
pnpm add vue-js-star-rating
```

## Basic Usage (Vue 3)

```vue
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { VueStarRate } from 'vue-js-star-rating';
import 'vue-js-star-rating/dist/style.css';

const rating = ref(0);
</script>

<template>
  <VueStarRate v-model="rating" />
</template>
```

## Props API

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | number | 0 | Rating value (v-model) |
| maxStars | number | 5 | Maximum number of stars |
| allowHalf | boolean | false | Enable half ratings |
| size | 'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl' | 'md' | Size preset |
| iconSize | number \| { width, height } | auto | Override size |
| colors | object | {...} | Color configuration |
| readonly | boolean | false | Disable interaction |
| showCounter | boolean | false | Show rating counter |
| showTooltip | boolean | false | Show hover tooltips |
| animation | object | {...} | Animation configuration |

## Colors Object

```typescript
{
  empty: '#d1d5db',    // Empty star color
  filled: '#fbbf24',   // Filled star color
  hover: '#fcd34d',    // Hover state color
  half: '#fbbf24'      // Half-star color
}
```

## Events

| Event | Payload | Description |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| update:modelValue | number | Emitted on rating change |
| change | (value, oldValue) | Emitted with previous value |
| hover | number \| null | Emitted on star hover |

## Keyboard Navigation

- Arrow Right/Up: Increase rating
- Arrow Left/Down: Decrease rating
- Home: Set to minimum (0)
- End: Set to maximum
- 1-9: Jump to specific value
- 0: Reset to zero
